Articles.Content:
True.

The user below me speak at least two languages.

Not at all. Tried to learn French, and it utterly failed

TUBM is a shameless proton who will help me with the number war.

True.

Whoever is below me has a tail.

Well, yes - a pony tail.

The user below me does not have a taill.

I have a tail, pls. Its a fox tail though (no im not furry!)

TUBM has a fox tail too.

Nope.

TUBM knows a good tall tale.

False :-S

The user below me is having a ball.

Yes.

The user below me is proud of his username.
Kind of. The user below me has BDarmory.

Yes, And some additons to it too.

The use below me uses google chrome

True.

The user below me looks like this:

Nope. I look like a normal human being

TUBM owns a Macbook computer

No, actually. My computer is my own [hardware only. I do have to use Vista as an operating system. Say what you will, it's good!]

You want to vomit after hearing that.

I never used vista, so i have no frame of reference.

The,user,below,me likes to play as,a,cat person.

Where, what? Nah.

TUBM is not a cat.
Yes, TUBM likes cookies

Well, who doesn't like cookies???

The user below me likes cheesecake.

Yuck.

TUBM does not exist.

True. I am Siri

TUBM has visited every single planet and moon in KSP legit (and before you ask, yes, I have)

Yup.

The user below me thinks interplanetary is hard in KSP.

Depends on where you are going (like Dres and Eeloo are extremely difficult, especially Eeloo)

TUBM listens to rap music

In the '80's and 90's, but now I find it far too simplistic, and the lyrics are insulting to one's intelligence (eventho' they weren't ever Shakespeare, they were a little better in the past).

TUBM has been to a Marilyn Manson concert (yeah, I have. Great fun!).

No.

TUBM likes chicken liver.

And sid meier.

No.

The user below me is ready for Wii U(point oh)

I owned one shortly, but it broke itself during a storm. It was weird how it happened as well.

I wager you prefer the old school 8/16-bit tanks from back then, eh?
